update HZ_BREAKPOINT
P_PACKNO = #{pPackno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_ITEM = #{pItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_TCECN = #{pTcecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_ECN = #{pEcn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_DATE = #{pDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_OECN = #{pOecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

P_RESERVE5 = #{pReserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_TIME = #{feedbackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
